title: Schedule F Implementation Deadline: Systematic Federal Workforce Reclassification
summary: Office of Personnel Management sets April 20 deadline for federal agencies to submit recommendations for Schedule F worker reclassifications, representing coordinated systematic implementation of federal workforce capture. Estimated 50,000 positions (2% of federal workforce) targeted for conversion from career civil servants to at-will political appointees, demonstrating unprecedented scale of systematic institutional capture coordination.

sources.title: Trump removes civil service protections with Schedule F plan
